explanation: [0-0] In front of a yellow and red background stands a young girl with two braids, wearing a black dress and gothic makeup. She wears a badge that reads "SECURITY," her arms crossed over her chest, her head turned to the right.

[3-5] Then the screen switches to a pair of white shoes. The camera moves up to reveal a pair of legs in black socks, a black skirt, and hands clasped in front. The camera then moves to the face: a girl with the same gothic makeup and two braids as the previous girl smiles and waves her right hand to the front. Then she stops smiling, turns her head to the right, crosses her arms over her chest, and looks forward.

[5-9] The screen switches back to the girl with braids. She looks to the left, shrugs her shoulder, and extends her left hand. The screen switches to a close-up of her left hand as she wiggles her fingers twice before withdrawing her hand. A right hand crawls up to her shoulder and wiggles its fingers. This right hand has some black stitches on it, and a black and white tag on the wrist.
